name: 4Lines
description:
4Lines is my adaptation of classic Achtung, die Kurve! This game was made for LÖVE JAM 2022, I joined to this challenge four days after jam beginning. The optional theme was "Earthquake" but this was my first touch with Lua and Love2D (in addition to unfinished roblox project) so restriction of choice to language and library which i never use is for me like a theme of jam.

Controls:

Blue: Q + A

Beige: C + V

Orange: J + K

Red: Left + Right

Press SPACE to START
